{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Shikanoin Heizou
|date               = 2023-07-24
|zh                 = ;今天是鹿野院平藏的生日哦，我们快去为他庆祝吧！
:'''旅行者：'''今天这趟外出发现了不少有用的线索。
:'''鹿野院平藏：'''哎呀呀，和你搭档果然是正确的选择！不过小派蒙怎么看起来无精打采的。
:'''派蒙：'''哼哼，还不是因为你昨天说的那个「清籁调查怪谈」…
:'''旅行者：'''派蒙听完做噩梦了，没睡好呢。
:'''鹿野院平藏：'''原来是这样啊。
:'''鹿野院平藏：'''在我还是新人时，曾经也被案子吓到过，后来倒是找到了缓解方法。
:'''派蒙：'''是、是什么方法？
:'''鹿野院平藏：'''那就是——一整天只吃油炸食物！
:'''鹿野院平藏：'''你们这是什么表情，真的有效哦。
:'''派蒙：'''欸——欸？真的吗？
:'''派蒙：'''现在也快到吃饭时间了，旅行者，不如我们试试吧…
|dialogue_review_zh = 哎呀呀，和你搭档果然是正确的选择！
|en                 = ;Today is [[Shikanoin Heizou]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with him!
:'''Traveler:''' We went outside and found many useful clues today.
:'''Shikanoin Heizou:''' Partnering with you is the right choice as I expected. However, why is little Paimon so tired?
:'''Paimon:''' Hmph, if you didn't mention about the "Seirai Investigation Tales"...
:'''Traveler:''' Paimon had nightmares about hearing that and didn't sleep well.
:'''Shikanoin Heizou:''' Oh, it is because of that.
:'''Shikanoin Heizou:''' When I started become a detective, I was sometimes scared due to the cases. Later, I found a method to solve that.
:'''Paimon:''' So, what's the method?
:'''Shikanoin Heizou:''' The method is -- eating only fried food for a day!
:'''Paimon:''' Wait, wait, really?
:'''Paimon:''' It's dinner time now, traveler. Shall we try that...
|dialogue_review_en = Partnering with you is the right choice as I expected.
